ComicInfo.Penciller: Mat Broome,Pop Mhan,Salvador Larroca,Jeff Rebner,Mat Broome,Salvador Larroca,Pop Mhan,Jeff Rebner
ComicInfo.Summary:
Stormwatch discovers that the monster who was responsible for Battalion's death was a mutated Maul of the WildC.A.T.S team. Void teleports in and snags Maul away from Skywatch. Synergy is captured by Argos.
Freed up from the diplomatic restrictions of Stormwatch, Cannon returns to Gamorra to clean the place up.
ComicInfo.Title: Loose Cannon Part 2
